description: Squarefree numbers whose Euler totient function is also squarefree.
example: 86 is here because it is squarefree and the same holds for Phi[ 86 ]=42.
mathematica: Abs[ MoebiusMu[ EulerPhi[ x ] ] ]=1 and Abs[ MoebiusMu[ x ] ]=1Select[Range[500],And@@SquareFreeQ/@{#,EulerPhi[#]}&] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 05 2013 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_
